channel.title: Project East - A 2006 Pk Based Server
channel.description:
[center]Original Base & Client: - https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=534061.0
Note: This is my first DEV thread. And my first real attempt at a server.
[b][size=18pt]Goals/Status[/size][/b]
- All Weapons/Combat Sounds -
.. All Melee Sounds
.. All Ranged Sounds
.. All Magic Sounds
.. All Npc Sounds
[b]____________________________________[/b]
- 100% Ranged
.. Ranged Following
.. Perfect Hit formula's
.. Throwing Knifes
.. Bows
.. Darts
.. Degrading Crystal Bow
.. Perfect Timers
.. Ranged Following
.. All Animations
[b]____________________________________[/b]
- 100% Melee
.. All weapons have Specs
.. Correct Timers and Animations
.. Perfect Max hit formula
[b]____________________________________[/b]
100% Magic
.. All Modern Combat Spells Work
.. All miscellaneous Spells
.. All Ancient Spells Work
.. Correct Freeze Timers
.. Correct Casting Animations
.. 100% Auto Casting
.. Magic Following
.. Correct Cast distance
.. Correct Spell Effects
[size=18pt]Current Stage:[/size] In Development
Recent Updates:
[b]Added Clipped Npc Combat - March 1st
Added Clipped Player Combat & Following - March 2nd
Updated Cache from 317 to 377 - March 3rd
Perfect Ranged Hit Forumla's added - March 4th
Combat Following Perfected - March 4th
Most Prayers updated 100% - March 5th
Added Cycle Even Manager - March 6th
Added Tier 1, 2 and 3 Rare drops from monsters - March 8th
Added Full Dagganoth Kings (Including correct weakness) And monsters around them - March 10th [/b]
[b][size=14pt]Fixed Bugs[/size][/b]
[size=8pt] - 3 Person Duel bug fixed - Magic Shortbow Crash fixed - Potions are undrinkable bug fixed - Food timers fixed[/size]
Media
[size=12pt]Clipped Combat[/size]
[IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/1207/clippedcombat.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Rare Caskets - Dropped By Bosses[/size]
[IMG]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/6271/chestrewards.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Dagganoth Kings[/size]
[IMG]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/3681/daggkings.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Random Other Things[/size]
[size=18pt]Videos[/size]
[size=12pt]Attack Sounds[/size] [size=12pt]Special Attacks[/size]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l25IhZfJSIc&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DeC6z7BlDtA&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
Adding more pictures Atm ...[/center]

item.title: Project East - A 2006 Pk Based Server
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

arham 4:

Good luck! This server makes the others look horrible. Very nice! Ateast it’s not 600+ items! ME SOO SMART!

Hahaha so true. I hate newer revisions. And not to mention most people who do newer revisions add 5000 customs and ugly interfaces.

Read full topic
item.source: Project East - A 2006 Pk Based Server

item.title: Project East - A 2006 Pk Based Server
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Some more info on your goals would be fun.
Else Good luck! You got my support, I’m curious what you can make of this. And at least it’s not such shitty 317 loading 600+

Read full topic
